p: Cell suspension of Achillea millefolium administrated with geraniol, borneol, menthol, thymol and farnesol converts these into several products and glycosylate, both the substrates and the biotransformation products. The decrease in glycosylated compounds afterwards implies that this glycolization mechanism is both used for detoxification and to convert VOC in readily usable forms to incorporate them in the metabolism [ 108].
